roles.name: User Access administrator
roles.description: Perform most delegated access operations for users and service accounts. This includes managing standard groups, assigning/revoking non-admin roles, and inviting users. Cannot assign the Org Admin role or manage any group that contains the User Access Administrator role (to prevent privilege escalation).

roles.name: User Access principal viewer
roles.description: Perform read operations as a non-Organization Administrator on principals within user access.
